[URL]/xml/journal?type=[type]&from=[from]&to=[to]
For a local service the type has to be Decimal coded.


Examples:
local
http://localhost:1200/980df9f1-7c11-4f1d-8248-3cb6fb179d3d/xml/journal?type=4707387510509010945&from=0&to=0

signaturcloud-sandbox
https://signaturcloud-sandbox.fiskaltrust.at/xml/journal?type=0x4154000000000001&from=0&to=0
